extraction_metadata.notes: Match results extracted manually from fussball.de screenshots

completed_matches.notes: PLACEHOLDER - Replace with actual extracted data

extraction_instructions.step_1: Open each screenshot and look for match results sections
extraction_instructions.step_2: Look for completed games showing final scores
extraction_instructions.step_3: Extract match dates, team names, and final scores
extraction_instructions.step_4: Note match status (should be 'beendet' for completed)
extraction_instructions.step_5: Update this JSON with all found match results

data_quality_notes: Screenshots need manual examination for match results
Date formats may vary and need standardization
Team names must match those used in league table
Some match details may be incomplete
Season may not have started yet - check for actual completed matches
